responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "725D398E40208DD339A6F3A59C4097BA", "The Hall of Judication was once a grand symbol of justice and order, with beautiful carvings and symbols dedicated to Aldric the Divine Arbiter. It stood as a shining example of Aelan devotion. But after the Exalted left during the Great Exodus, the hall fell into ruin. The Bonebinder Goblins moved in and turned it into a base for their dark rituals. They desecrated the sacred symbols and twisted the artifacts to their own evil ends.")
name: DD_CSQ_0090_Alysandra_9_Response
